page.title: 18Children's Games
page.content: At school we sometimes play{'tig ball' One person has the ball and lets the other people run off.Then they have to throw the ball at those who are running about.If they are hit they are 'on'.Another game we play is 'polo'. First one person is 'on'.He or she picks a subject such as 'cars',then they have to turn round.The other group of people pick names connected with the subject such as 'Mini'.Then the first person turns round and says one of the names that has just been picked.If they pick the name you have just chosen you have to run to the place where they were standing while they run to your place and then both run back.{'Polo'}is shouted when the run is completed.The first person to shout is on. { }
